bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with gui xie 鬼邪 , demon evil. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 24: 語聲不出，短氣欲 死，飲食不下，吐逆上氣，去來無常，狀如鬼祟 , “[The patient] is unable to speak. He experiences shortness of qi and wishes to die. He can neither drink nor eat. He vomits with counter-movement of qi. This comes and goes without any regularity. The appearance resembles that of being cursed by a demon ”.
